Dear [Recipient's Name],

We are thrilled to have you join the EON TOT / Community of Practice! To ensure a smooth onboarding experience, we've prepared a step-by-step guide for you to follow in the coming weeks. The following actions will be key to your successful integration:

1. **Take Assessments**: As a first step, we invite you to sign up on our community platform and take two crucial assessments that will help you explore your personal and organizational wellbeing needs:
   - **Wellbeing and Engagement at Work Assessment** [Link Here]
   - **Character Strength Assessment** [Link Here]
   
   Once you've completed these, you can view your results and set your priorities under the 'Growth' tab.

2. **Connect with the Community**: We encourage you to connect with other members through the following platforms:
   - **Telegram**: We utilize Telegram for real-time communication and reminders. Join our Wellbeing TOT group [Link Here].
   - **Bloom Community**: This platform hosts our organized discussions. Once you sign up, you'll automatically join our community. To learn more about this platform, watch our introduction video [Link Here].

3. **Schedule Your Onboarding Call**: After completing the above steps, please schedule a 30-minute onboarding call with me, Bilal. You can do so by clicking on my Calendly link [Link Here].

To keep track of our upcoming schedule, please visit our community page [Link Here].

In addition, we have compiled a collection of wellbeing resources that you might find useful, and we'd love your contributions as well [Link Here].

Looking forward to seeing you online soon!

Best regards,

Bilal and the EON team ðŸŒ»
